profiles:
Summary Team Lead in Google Online India Pvt. Ltd. 
Details: 
Vertical head for the Finance, Retail and Travel teams  
•	Responsible for 7.7M worth of revenue targets across all three verticals  
•	Actively engaged in bottom up planning for targets, ensuring accurate portfolio level goal setting and tracking goals through internal tools. 
•	Provide industry level advise to teams to ensure holistic understanding of industry 
•	Sales mentoring and efficacy enhancement in client communication through incoming and outgoing calls. 
•	Setting appropriate sales strategies across customer segments. 
•	Engage in staffing activities for movements within the team ( across verticals), new entrants in the team 
•	Set up regular trainings for new as well as regular team members to up-skill in sales skills such as ‘sales academy trainings.’ Specialties:Online Advertising sales. Summary Team Lead in Google Online India Pvt. Ltd.

Adhere to and uphold all policies and procedures in the Housing Agreement and the Cogswell Code of Student Conduct. 
Use good judgment and positive communication to resolve conflicts/problems. 
Be available and accessible to housing students. 
Be interested in and supportive of students’ interests, problems, and needs. 
Know all residents in student housing. Meet with new residents and orient them to Cogswell. 
Maintain regular contact with residents to provide them with information of interest to the community, including communications from Student Life and the College. 
Serve as a mediator in conflict situations. 
 
ACTIVITIES: 
Initiate, facilitate, attend and evaluate activities based on the needs of residents in student housing. 
Assist in creating programs that bring together residential, social, and academic life at Cogswell.
